title: 求汉化
author: AN.KH
txt_content: www.9minecraft.net/crazy-ores-mod/好像叫疯狂的矿石mod吧求汉化

replies.author: overseraph
replies.txt_content: 你要什么版本的汉化。30金粒求汉化有点少的。。
